function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced accessibility to UGS due to pandemic restrictions","Impact":"Decreased physical activity, increased stress, and reduced mental well-being","Mitigation":"Implement measures to ensure safe usage of UGS during pandemic, provide alternative outdoor spaces for physical activity","Technologies":"Outdoor monitoring systems, crowd density tracking, contactless access systems","People":"Urban dwellers, families, individuals seeking outdoor activities","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Transmission risks in densely built urban areas","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity and shared spaces","Mitigation":"Implement hygiene protocols, increase ventilation, reduce overcrowding in urban spaces","Technologies":"Air purification systems, contactless technology, crowd monitoring systems","People":"Urban dwellers, workers, commuters","Owner":"Local governments, building owners, employers"},{"Description":"Impact on mental health and well-being due to reduced access to UGS","Impact":"Increased stress, anxiety, and depression due to lack of outdoor recreational spaces","Mitigation":"Promote awareness about alternative indoor activities, provide mental health support services","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps, virtual fitness programs","People":"Urban dwellers, families, individuals in need of mental health support","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"}]}
